import React, { useEffect ,useState} from 'react' const App = ()=> { const [data, setData] = useState([]) const getCovidData = async()=> { try{ const res = await fetch('https://api.covid19india.org/data.json') const actualData = await res.json() console.log(actualData) setData(actualData.statewise[0]) } catch(error){ console.log(error) } } useEffect(() => { getCovidData() },[]) return ( <>

ðŸ”´LIVE

COVID-19 LIVE TRACKER

  • OUR COUNTRY

    INDIA

  • TOTAL RECOVERED

    {data.recovered}

  • TOTAL CONFIRMED

    {data.confirmed}

  • TOTAL DEATH

    {data.deaths}

  • TOTAL ACTIVE

    {data.active}

  • LAST UPDATED

    {data.lastupdatedtime}

) } export default App
